name: Dungeon Speller
description:
It's like a dungeon crawler, except you're just spelling stuff!

Spell words using your enemy's letters to deal 1 damage for each letter.

This one is pretty WIP right now!

  • Very unbalanced
  • Reload page to get new starting class
  • Most characters don't have custom abilities yet
  • Nothing happens when you hit 0 hp, pretend you're dead! (or don't, have fun)
  • I've only gotten about a third of the way through implementing enemies and player chars
  • The word list is not great
  • There's not great feedback on why your word fails to submit
  • Not good feedback on how a word resolves (damage & hp)

I'm having fun with this one still, so I'm going to keep shipping updates to address these things. :-)
